me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui

Class ButtonGadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.Gadget
      • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.ClickableGadget
        • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.ButtonGadget

  • public class ButtonGadget
extends ClickableGadget
    A GUI gadget which allows code to be run when it's clicked.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonGadget

        public ButtonGadget(InventoryGUI owner,
            int slot,
            String text,
            String[] lore,
            ItemStack texture,
            Runnable callback)
        Constructs a button gadget.
        Parameters:
        owner - the GUI which this button belongs to
        slot - the GUI slot that this button should be displayed in
        text - the button text
        lore - the extended button tooltip
        texture - the item to use as the button's texture
        callback - the code which should be run when the button is clicked
